import re

def extract_numbers(input_string):
    input_string = re.sub('', '', input_string)
    numbers = re.findall('\\d+\\.?\\d*', input_string)
    return numbers

import re

def extract_numbers(input_string):
    input_string = re.sub('<.*?>', 'MUTATED', input_string)
    numbers = re.findall('\\d+\\.?\\d*', input_string)
    return numbers

import re

def extract_numbers(input_string):
    input_string = re.sub('<.*?>', '', input_string)
    numbers = re.findall('', input_string)
    return numbers
